entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets or snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets in the evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
